name: birdgame
description: Bird Feed Chase - packaged web game

scripts.build: tsc && copy index.html dist && copy style.css dist && copy manifest.json dist && powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse assets dist\assets -Force"
scripts.prepare-www: npm run build && powershell -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force www -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory www | Out-Null; Copy-Item dist\index.html,dist\style.css,dist\manifest.json www\; Get-ChildItem dist -Filter '*.js' -File | Copy-Item -Destination www\; Copy-Item -Recurse dist\assets www\assets -Force"
scripts.cap:copy: npm run prepare-www && npx cap copy
